alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 5:28AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...Along the White River in portions of southwest South Dakota, including the following counties, in southwest South Dakota, Jackson. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 528 AM MDT, gauge reports indicated heavy rain fell in the area over the past 24 hours. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas along the White River near Highway 44 near Interior and northern Pine Ridge Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
